document.heading: City Market at O Street Tax Increment Financing Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-278, the “City Market at O Street Tax Increment Financing Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-800 which was referred to the Committee on Financing and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 15, 2008, and September 16, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 3, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-533 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-278 became effective on November 25, 2008.
